Class DatabaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.quickveggies.dao.DatabaseClient

  • public class DatabaseClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This this class is used to interract with database

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DatabaseClient.DBProfile
      This class is intended to build up a Database profile
      static class  DatabaseClient.DBProvider
      This enumeration is intended to enumerated all supported database by quickveggie app Currently the only supported one is microsoft sql server
      static class  DatabaseClient.MSSQLServerDBProfile
      This class is intended to build up a microsoft Sql Server Database profile

      • addFruitBoxSizes

        public void addFruitBoxSizes(java.lang.String fruitName,
                             java.util.List<java.lang.String> boxSizeStrings)
        Use this method to create a new list of box size types for a fruit, if box size types with the same name are found in the DB, then the old box size types would be used, otherwise new entries would be created. This method also associates the specified fruit with the passed in box size types.
        Parameters:
        fruitName -
        boxSizeStrings -
